abstractresponse.name: AbstractResponse
abstractresponse.description: Contains the normalized response fields from payment gateways that are common to all the other gateway responses. This class can’t be instantiated on its own. This class implements the GatewayResponse class. Other GatewayResponse classes extend this class to inherit common properties.

auditparamsrequest.name: AuditParamsRequest
auditparamsrequest.description: AuditParamsRequest is used for audit parameters in a transaction request. This is an abstract request class that is extended by the BaseRequest class.

baserequest.name: BaseRequest
baserequest.description: BaseRequest is extended by all the request classes.

capturerequest.name: CaptureRequest
capturerequest.description: Represents a Capture request. This class extends the BaseRequest class and inherits all its methods.

captureresponse.name: CaptureResponse
captureresponse.description: The payment gateway adapter sends this response for the Capture request type. This class extends AbstractResponse and inherits its methods.

custommetadatatypeinfo.name: CustomMetadataTypeInfo
custommetadatatypeinfo.description: Access information about custom metadata. The PaymentGatewayAdapter can send CustomMetadataTypeInfo to transaction requests through the response object’s SalesforceResultCodeInfo.

gatewayerrorresponse.name: GatewayErrorResponse
gatewayerrorresponse.description: Use to respond with an Error following high-level errors from the PaymentGateway adapter, such as request-forbidden responses, custom validation errors, or expired API tokens.

gatewayresponse.name: GatewayResponse
gatewayresponse.description: Generic payment gateway response interface. It can be referred, but gateway adapters shouldn’t implement this interface.

paymentgatewayadapter.name: PaymentGatewayAdapter
paymentgatewayadapter.description: PaymentGatewayAdapters can implement this interface in order to process requests.

paymentgatewaycontext.name: PaymentGatewayContext
paymentgatewaycontext.description: PaymentGatewayAdapters can implement this interface in order to process requests.

paymentshttp.name: PaymentsHttp
paymentshttp.description: Make an HTTP request to start the interaction with the payment gateway.

referencedrefundrequest.name: ReferencedRefundRequest
referencedrefundrequest.description: Access information about the referenced refund requests. Extends RefundRequest.

referencedrefundresponse.name: ReferencedRefundResponse
referencedrefundresponse.description: The payment gateway adapter sends this response for the ReferencedRefund request type.

salesforceresultcode.name: SalesforceResultCode
salesforceresultcode.description: Defines the gateway call status values in Salesforce based on the call status values that the payment gateway returned.

salesforceresultcodeinfo.name: SalesforceResultCodeInfo
salesforceresultcodeinfo.description: Apex object for storing Salesforce result code information from payment gateway adapters.
